title: Games Included With GTA+
headline: Games Included With GTA+
subtitle: Now includes L.A. Noire
content:
Step into the shoes of LAPD Detective Cole Phelps and unravel the truth behind a string of arson attacks, racketeering conspiracies, and brutal murders during one of the most corrupt and violent times in L.A. history.

Sign up now to access this and a host of other GTA+ benefits.

GTA+ Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
button: Select to sign up to GTA+
